title: Shopify Store Manager+Design & Marketing VA(Part-Time,PH Applicants Only
job_overview:
We’re hiring a creative and experienced Virtual Assistant from the Philippines to manage and grow two Shopify stores under the Kubentro brand:

???? Kubentro.shop — our lifestyle product store (Printful: apparel, mugs, bags)

???? Upgrade to see actual info — our general product store (CJ Dropshipping: electronics, pet, toys)


You will handle product uploads, store design, content creation, and digital marketing across both platforms, keeping a clean and consistent visual brand.


---

???? Responsibilities:

Manage and improve both Shopify stores: Kubentro.shop and Upgrade to see actual info

Upload and organize products from Printful and CJ Dropshipping

Design homepage layouts, banners, and product categories using Canva or Shopify tools

Suggest trending, high-converting products with quality descriptions

Post short product videos or reels on TikTok/Facebook (or provide the content)

Use creative marketing strategies to help boost store sales and visibility

Write and schedule weekly email campaigns (Shopify Email, Mailchimp, or Klaviyo)

Track store performance: traffic, abandoned carts, customer behavior

Send clear progress updates every Friday



---

? Requirements:

At least 1 year of experience with Shopify store management

Knowledge of Printful or CJ Dropshipping

Canva or similar design tool skills

Familiar with Upgrade to see actual info trends and Facebook/Instagram marketing

Experience with email marketing (any platform is fine)

Strong English communication

Self-motivated, organized, and focused on results

Available 20 hours/week (Monday to Friday)



---


???? Trial: 1-month paid trial — continued 6–12 months if performance is strong



---

???? How to Apply:

Send the following:

1. Full name


2. Link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile


3. Brief summary of your Shopify + marketing + design experience


4. Your answers to the Test Task below




---

???? Test Task (REQUIRED to Apply):

1. Visit: Upgrade to see actual info


2. Suggest 2 improvements to the homepage or product layout


3. Choose 2 products and explain why you would promote them


4. Suggest 1 TikTok video idea for one of the products


5. Write a short email:

Subject line
 
Email body promoting any product from the store





---

? Important:

This is a real opportunity for someone who wants to grow with a brand. If you’re serious, creative, and know how to turn traffic into sales — we want you.
